_rawTooltip.fullTooltip:
Innate: Sylas gains an Unshackled stack for 4 seconds whenever he casts an ability, refreshing on subsequent ability casts. Sylas can have up to 3 Unshackled stacks at a time, and while he has stacks, he gains [[3]].
Unshackled: Sylas' next basic attack consumes an Unshackled stack to whirl his chains around him, having an uncancelable windup, dealing [[0]] to the primary target and [[1]] to nearby secondary targets.
Damage to secondary targets executes minions that are left at or below [[2]].
The empowered attack applies on-hit effects to the primary target but disables Sylas' critical strikes' bonus damage. Spell effects only apply to secondary targets.
Sylas lashes his chains out, dealing [[0]] and [[1]] by 15/20/25/30/35% for 1.5 seconds. The place where the chains intersect explodes, dealing a further [[2]].
Sylas lunges at an enemy with magical force dealing [[0]]. Against champions, Sylas restores between [[1]] and [[2]] based on his missing Health (max healing at or below 40% Health).

Sylas quickly dashes, and prepares a [[0]] for 3.5 seconds.

[[1]] Sylas throws his chains, pulling himself to the first enemy hit, dealing [[2]], and [[3]] for 0.35 seconds.

Sylas hijacks an enemy champion, allowing him to cast a copy of their ultimate Ability, based on his Ultimate level and using his stats.

Hijacking an enemy places a Cooldown on them for 200% (modified by Sylas' Ability Haste) of the enemy's ultimate's Cooldown, with a minimum of 40 seconds, during which time Sylas cannot hijack them again.
